text: The Ambassador of Malaysia to Ukraine is the head of Malaysia's diplomatic mission to Ukraine. The position has the rank and status of an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary and is based in the Embassy of Malaysia, Kyiv. ==List of heads of mission== ===Ambassadors to Poland and concurrently accredited to Ukraine=== {| class=wikitable ! AmbassadorHistory – Embassy of Malaysia, Kyiv ! Term start ! Term end |- | Abd Rahman Abd Rahim || 22 February 1995 || |- | Muhammad Noh || 8 April 1997 || |- | Ng Bak Hai || 24 October 2000 || |- | Mohd Daud Yusoff || 30 April 2004 || |} ===Ambassadors to Ukraine=== {| class=wikitable ! AmbassadorHistory – Embassy of Malaysia, Kyiv ! Term start ! Term end |- | Aminahtun Karim Shaharudin || 18 November 2004 || |- | Abdullah Sani Omar || 30 January 2008 || |- | Chuah Teong Ban || 6 April 2011 || |- | Ayauf Bachi || 14 June 2016 || |- | Raja Reza Raja Zaib Shah || 2018 || Incumbent |} ==See also== * Malaysia–Ukraine relations == References == Ukraine Malaysia
title: List of ambassadors of Malaysia to Ukraine
